wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant General Sir Nicholas Arthur William Pope,  (born 1962) was a senior British Army officer. He served as Master-General of the Ordnance from 2011 to 2013 and Deputy Chief of the General Staff from 2015 to 2019.

response: Nicholas Pope (1949, Sydney), British/Australian artist. He studied at the Bath Academy of Art (1970–73). In 1974 he was granted a Romanian Government Exchange Scholarship and in 1976 the Calouste Gulbenkian Foundation Award.biography, nicholaspope.co.uk
